```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(haven)

all_risk_set <- read.csv("datasets/all_risk_set.csv")
state_data <- read_dta("datasets/race_health_data.dta") %>% 
  rename(State = "statename", Year = "year")

risk_state <- all_risk_set %>% 
  left_join(state_data)
```

```{r}
export(risk_state, "risk_states.csv")
```
